sections.heading: IV and V school districts; school tax; how payable
sections.text: All taxes collected for the benefit of the public schools in Class IV and V school districts shall be paid in money and shall be subject to the order of the board of education.SourceLaws 1891, c. 45, ยง 23, p. 325;R.S.1913, ยง 7029;C.S.1922, ยง 6660;C.
